select login_id loginId, employee_ID employeeId, employee_name employeeName, pass_word password, role_id roleID where 1=1
and employee_ID='${employeeID}'
and employee_name='${employeeName}'

select staffISST_num,hw_number,staff_name, staffisst_account, pass_word ,create_time, update_time,into_date,out_date from sys_staffbaseinfo where staff_state= '${staffState}'
and staffisst_account='${staffisstAccount}'
and pass_word='${password}'

select * from sys_staffbaseinfo u, sys_role r,sys_staff_role s where u.staffISST_num=s.staffISST_num and r.role_id=s.role_id and r.status='${status}'
and staffisst_account='${staffisstAccount}'
and role_id = '${roleId}'
